lambda1.expert_suggestion: Use 0.01 as default. Higher values promote sparser graphs, lower values allow more connections.

loss_type.expert_suggestion: Use l2 as default. l2 is more implicit and smooth to learn a sparse graph, l1 is more explicit but may lead to a over-penalized graph.

w_threshold.meaning: Threshold for edge weights in adjacency matrix
w_threshold.expert_suggestion: Use 0.3 as default. Higher values lead to sparser graphs by pruning weak connections, which is a kind of implicit sparsity.
